title: Palestine Embassy Thanks India For 1st Tranche Of $2.5 Million For Refugees
content: The Palestinian Embassy on Tuesday thanked India as it released the first tranche of USD 2.5 million to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency (UNRWA) as a part of its annual contribution of USD 5 Million for the year 2024-2025.
summary: The Palestinian Embassy on Tuesday thanked India as it released the first tranche of USD 2.5 million to the United Nations Relief and Works Agency (UNRWA) as a part of its annual contribution of USD 5 Million for the year 2024-2025.

title: India Reaffirms Continued Support To Mauritius In Its Quest For Progress
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Tuesday reaffirmed India's consistent and continued support to Mauritius in its quest for progress and prosperity.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Tuesday reaffirmed India's consistent and continued support to Mauritius in its quest for progress and prosperity.

title: Opinion: Kamala Harris To Rishi Sunak, Indians Must Be Realistic About Indian-Origin Leaders Abroad
content: In case Biden withdraws from the US presidential race and Kamala Harris replaces him I am sure people in India, more particularly in Tamil Nadu, will feel proud. But do not expect any favours from her if she wins.
summary: In case Biden withdraws from the US presidential race and Kamala Harris replaces him I am sure people in India, more particularly in Tamil Nadu, will feel proud. But do not expect any favours from her if she wins.

title: Joe Biden Dials Down Attacks On Donald Trump After Rally Shooting
content: The assassination attempt on Donald Trump has forced Joe Biden's campaign to dial down its attacks for now, with the US president admitting he was wrong to say his rival should be put in the "bullseye."
summary: The assassination attempt on Donald Trump has forced Joe Biden's campaign to dial down its attacks for now, with the US president admitting he was wrong to say his rival should be put in the "bullseye."

title: Joe Biden Might Not Be Backed By Key Labour Union Teamsters In US This Time
content: President Joe Biden is on the brink of failing to win a key labor endorsement as leaders of the 1.3 million-member Teamsters union consider backing no candidate at all in the US presidential race, according to two people familiar with the matter.
summary: President Joe Biden is on the brink of failing to win a key labor endorsement as leaders of the 1.3 million-member Teamsters union consider backing no candidate at all in the US presidential race, according to two people familiar with the matter.

title: Watch: Woman's "Suspicious" Behaviour During Trump Rally Shooting Is Viral
content: Former US President Donald Trump narrowly escaped an assassination attempt at a campaign rally on Saturday.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump narrowly escaped an assassination attempt at a campaign rally on Saturday.

title: Elon Musk Denies Pledging $45 Million A Month For Trump Election
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has rejected a report claiming that he plans to give $45 million a month to a new super political-action committee (PAC) supporting former US President Donald Trump's presidential run, calling it "fake."
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has rejected a report claiming that he plans to give $45 million a month to a new super political-action committee (PAC) supporting former US President Donald Trump's presidential run, calling it "fake."

title: Not Trump, Biden Dialled Widow Of Rally Shooting Victim. She Didn't Pick Up
content: The wife of the firefighter, who was killed during an attack at a Donald Trump rally, received a call from President Joe Biden after the tragedy struck her family on Saturday.
summary: The wife of the firefighter, who was killed during an attack at a Donald Trump rally, received a call from President Joe Biden after the tragedy struck her family on Saturday.

title: Israel Used US Bombs In Strike On Gaza's "Safe Zone" That Killed 92
content: Israel's deadly strike on Al-Mawasi, one of the bloodiest attacks in more than nine months of the war in Gaza, used massive payload bombs provided by the United States, according to weapons experts.
summary: Israel's deadly strike on Al-Mawasi, one of the bloodiest attacks in more than nine months of the war in Gaza, used massive payload bombs provided by the United States, according to weapons experts.

title: Secret Service Faces Backlash For Security Lapse Over Trump Rally Shooting
content: Facing growing criticism over a massive security failure, the US Secret Service on Monday vowed to cooperate with an independent review after a shooter was allowed to open fire on Donald Trump.
summary: Facing growing criticism over a massive security failure, the US Secret Service on Monday vowed to cooperate with an independent review after a shooter was allowed to open fire on Donald Trump.

title: Trump Riding Wave Of Wins After Struggling To Stay Afloat
content: After dodging a bullet at a rally and seeing the US Supreme Court bolster his presidential immunity claims this month, Donald Trump was handed another gift Monday: the dismissal of his classified documents case.
summary: After dodging a bullet at a rally and seeing the US Supreme Court bolster his presidential immunity claims this month, Donald Trump was handed another gift Monday: the dismissal of his classified documents case.

title: Kamala Harris Congratulates JD Vance For Being Trump's Vice President Pick
content: Vice President Kamala Harris left a congratulatory voicemail to GOP Ohio Senator JD Vance on Monday after he was announced as the Republican vice presidential pick on Truth Social by former President Donald Trump, The New York Post reported.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris left a congratulatory voicemail to GOP Ohio Senator JD Vance on Monday after he was announced as the Republican vice presidential pick on Truth Social by former President Donald Trump, The New York Post reported.

title: The Shocking Comments Trump's Running Mate Once Made On Him
content: Republican JD Vance, picked by Donald Trump as his running mate for the US elections, has been kind to the former president in the past. A harsh critic in the past, the Ohio Senator had called Trump a "moral disaster" and "America's Hitler".
summary: Republican JD Vance, picked by Donald Trump as his running mate for the US elections, has been kind to the former president in the past. A harsh critic in the past, the Ohio Senator had called Trump a "moral disaster" and "America's Hitler".

title: "What An Honor": JD Vance After Being Declared Trump's Vice President Pick
content: JD Vance, a Republican US Senator from Ohio, expressed gratitude on Tuesday for being picked as the running mate of US presidential candidate Donald Trump and called it an "honour" to run alongside him.
summary: JD Vance, a Republican US Senator from Ohio, expressed gratitude on Tuesday for being picked as the running mate of US presidential candidate Donald Trump and called it an "honour" to run alongside him.

title: X Recorded "All-Time High" Of 417 Billion User Seconds Globally: Elon Musk
content: Tech billionaire and Tesla CEO Elon Musk claimed on Tuesday that his platform X, formerly Twitter, reached a 'record high in usage'.
summary: Tech billionaire and Tesla CEO Elon Musk claimed on Tuesday that his platform X, formerly Twitter, reached a 'record high in usage'.

title: North Korean Diplomat Defects From Cuba To South Korea: Report
content: A high-ranking North Korean diplomat stationed in Cuba defected to South Korea last November -- just months before Seoul and Havana established diplomatic ties, a report said Tuesday.
summary: A high-ranking North Korean diplomat stationed in Cuba defected to South Korea last November -- just months before Seoul and Havana established diplomatic ties, a report said Tuesday.

title: Republican Harmeet Dhillon Leads Sikh Prayers At Convention, Trump Present
content: Harmeet Dhillon, a civil rights attorney and Republican Party leader led Sikh prayer 'ardas' at the Republican National Convention in the presence of presidential nominee Donald Trump, in Milwaukee today.
summary: Harmeet Dhillon, a civil rights attorney and Republican Party leader led Sikh prayer 'ardas' at the Republican National Convention in the presence of presidential nominee Donald Trump, in Milwaukee today.

title: Trump's Vice President Pick Reveals How His Hindu Wife Helped Him
content: In an interview, Usha Vance talked about her upbringing in a “religious household” with Indian Hindu parents.

title: New AI Chip In Development May Revolutionise ChatGPT
content: 'Sohu' claims to be 20 times faster in running transformers like ChatGPT than Nvidia's flagship- H100s, betting on transformer ASIC (Application Specific Integrated Circuits) chipset.
summary: 'Sohu' claims to be 20 times faster in running transformers like ChatGPT than Nvidia's flagship- H100s, betting on transformer ASIC (Application Specific Integrated Circuits) chipset.

title: What Trump Rally Shooter Did On Last Day Of His Life
content: The 20-year-old who allegedly tried to assassinate former US President Donald Trump at his campaign rally, made a series of stops in and around to collect arms and ammunition before the incident, the CNN reported.
summary: The 20-year-old who allegedly tried to assassinate former US President Donald Trump at his campaign rally, made a series of stops in and around to collect arms and ammunition before the incident, the CNN reported.
